DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether : ( 1 ) combination N-acetylcysteine + high-dose naltrexone ( 150 mg ) work well high-dose naltrexone ( 150 mg ) alone reduce alcohol drinking ; ( 2 ) high-dose naltrexone ( 150 mg ) alone work well low-dose naltrexone ( 50 mg ) alone reduce alcohol drinking .
DOC.brief_title: N-acetylcysteine Plus Naltrexone Treatment Alcohol Dependence
DOC.detailed_description: The 3 group ( N-acetylcysteine plus naltrexone 150 mg , naltrexone 150 mg , naltrexone 50 mg ) compare 12-week randomize , double-blind clinical trial .
